title: Everything you need to crack it
subtitle: Got questions on our no-drama design plans? Find your answers.

items.question: How does the design subscription work?
items.answer: Subscribe and start sending unlimited design requests. We tackle them one by one, delivering professional work fast, without the wait.

items.question: What's included in unlimited revisions?
items.answer: No caps on revisions here. We'll tweak and adjust until your vision's nailedâ€”guaranteeing you're beyond thrilled.

items.question: Can I pause or cancel my subscription?
items.answer: Absolutely, pause any time and kick it back on when you're ready. Cancel whenever - no strings or fees attached.

items.question: What types of design work do you handle?
items.answer: From logos to websites, print to digital, UX/UI to packaging, we've got all your design needs covered.

items.question: How fast will I receive my designs?
items.answer: Expect your designs within 48-72 hours usually. Bigger projects might take longer, but we're always upfront and keep you in the loop.

items.question: What if I don't like the design?
items.answer: We roll with unlimited tweaks until you say it's perfect. We'll use your input to make sure it's spot on.

items.question: How do I submit design requests?
items.answer: Drop your requests on our client portal. Need something complex? You can chat directly with your account manager too.

items.question: How does billing work?
items.answer: Billing's upfront each month, auto-renewing. We'll email you the invoice. Credit cards, bank transfers? We take 'em all.

items.question: Are there any setup fees?
items.answer: Zero setup fees! Just the monthly rate - transparent, straightforward, with no nasty surprises.

items.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
items.answer: Change your plan anytime. Upgrades are instant; downgrades adjust next billing cycle. We sort out the money bit fairly.
